headline: Rep. Fitzpatrick slams Biden for refusing to change course on oil production: 'You can't reason with crazy'
author: Fox News Staff
sentences: Fitzpatrick, who returned from a trip to the Ukraine border, joined "Fox & Friends" on Tuesday arguing "you can't reason with crazy" as he explained the importance of unleashing American energy to reduce the global alliance on Russian oil.

We have all the energy resources we need in this country, not only to be energy independent in America, but also to be the largest energy exporter to Europe so that they don't need to rely on Russia or Saudi Arabia or anybody else.
Rep. Brian Fitzpatrick, R-Pa., slammed the Biden administration for its energy policy as the White House faces growing calls to ban Russian oil imports.
It's politics, pure and simple, that's blocking this administration from doing the right thing.
BRIAN FITZPATRICK: Yeah, you can't reason with crazy.
A third-grader could tell you this.
Everybody knows the answer to this.
